description.part1: One day all adults were little… They remember that in the childhood the dreams are much brighter than those we have now. You will agree that we all wanted to make some of them come true. Atelier Lilu wants to help your child to have the most incredible fairy-tale dreams. That’s why each our item is a unique world made specially for your child. We are attentive to the details as you are to your children. Each bed has its own particular character and mood. Carefully preserving manufacturing traditions, we know exactly how to make a bed you have been looking for so long time.
description.part2: More than eight years ago I founded this brand. I am engaged in its development and run the furniture manufacturing. During that time we became the leaders of the Ukrainian premium furniture market and we are also successfully developing in Europe. Welcome to Atelier Lilu’s refined world.

descriptionCarousel.part1: A sophisticated bed of the Namur collection, the frame of which is made of natural wooden materials, will fit your child’s bedroom wonderfully. It has soft curves and a figured silhouette. The headboard and sides are decorated with capitonnage and studs. The bed is equipped with orthopedic floating slats on silicone holders, which gives additional comfort as well as increases the benefit of the anatomical mattress. Two decorative pillows measuring 45x45 cm in the color of bed are included.

The shape of Namur Lux bed will give a sense of security to your baby and will become a favorite place in his bedroom. The bed is equipped with orthopedic floating slats on silicone holders, which gives additional comfort and increases the benefit of the anatomical mattress. Two decorative pillows measuring 45x45 cm in the color of bed are included.

Refined piquing head of the sofa, elegant lines of Namur sofa will create an atmosphere that favours nice and fine rest. The sofa suits for grown-up children, nannies or guests. The sofa is completed with orthopedic floating lamellas on silicone holders which provide additional comfort and increase benefit of anatomic mattress. There are two cushions as a unit 45x45 cm in size coloured like the sofa.

A chair-bed of the Namur collection can be a great addition to the interior of the children's room, especially if there is a need for an extra bed for a nanny or a friend. The frame is made of natural wood materials. A mattress (Muss/Mini) and a removable cover are included. Measures of unfolded chair-bed are 900x1800 cm.

A comfortable and modern bed of the Florans collection, the frame of which is made of natural wooden materials, equipped with sidelong semi-crimps. The bed is equipped with orthopedic floating slats on silicone holders, which gives additional comfort and increases the benefit of the anatomical mattress. Two decorative pillows measuring 45x45 cm in the color of bed are included.

Your child’s table can be usefully supplemented by a compact and modern chair of the Florans collection. The frame of the chair is made of natural wooden materials, while the curved armrests make it very comfortable.

Modern sofa with curved head and lateral semi-sides is a perfect place for the rest and good sleep as well. Sofa is completed with orthopedic floating lamellas on silicone holders which provide additional comfort and increase benefit of anatomic mattress. There are two cushions as a unit 45x45 cm in size coloured like the sofa.

The rounded headboard of the Pom pon bed flows into the sides and is decorated with a contrasting purfle. The frame is made of natural wooden materials, which will provide a comfortable sleep. The bed is equipped with orthopedic floating slats on silicone holders, which gives additional comfort and increases the benefit of the anatomical mattress. Two decorative pillows measuring 45x45 cm in the color of bed are included.

A chair of the Pom pon collection with roundish headboard is made of natural wooden materials and high-quality soft upholstery. This one will be a successful addition to the interior of your child’s bedroom. It can also be used as a separate piece of furniture in small rooms.

Pom-pon divan with high legs and a round back is decorated with nails around the perimeter and smoothly turns into the base of the seat. The frame is made of natural wooden materials. The ergonomics of the sofa will provide convenience and comfort to your rest. It will complete both modern and classical interior of your room.

A safe bed model of the Brooklyn collection for the smallest ones will become a great place to relax and sleep. The high sides and the headboard are decorated with a capitonnage. The bed is equipped with orthopedic floating slats on silicone holders, which gives additional comfort and increases the benefit of the anatomical mattress. Two decorative pillows measuring 45x45 cm in the color of bed are included.

The safe model of a sofa of the Brooklyn collection for the smallest ones is a great place to relax and sleep. The high sides and the headboard are decorated with a capitonnage. The bed is equipped with orthopedic floating slats on silicone holders, which gives additional comfort and increases the benefit of the anatomical mattress. Two decorative pillows measuring 45x45 cm in the color of bed are included.

A bed of the Paris collection will impart personality to your child’s bedroom and will be the center of guests’ admiration. The headboard and sides are decorated with handmade diagonal braids, the perimeter is decorated with nails and purfle in the color of the bed. The bed is equipped with orthopedic floating slats on silicone holders, which gives additional comfort and increases the benefit of the anatomical mattress. Two decorative pillows measuring 45x45 cm in the color of bed are included.

A high-foot chair of the Paris collection with a rounded back is made of natural wooden materials and high-quality soft upholstery. This one will become a favorite resting place and a successful addition to the interior of your child’s bedroom.
Refined, figured and comfortable pouf from Paris collection will provide special nuance to the whole interior of the room. The pouf is decorated with decorative nails.

A comfortable bed of the Sidney collection fits perfectly into a modern and classic interior. The headboard and sides (armrests) are decorated with finishing nails, emphasizing the bed’s gracefulness and make the interior more elegant. The bed is equipped with orthopedic floating slats on silicone holders, which gives additional comfort and increases the benefit of the anatomical mattress. Two decorative pillows measuring 45x45 cm in the color of bed are included.

Sidney armchair with low wooden legs will perfectly fit into a modern and classical interior. It will also become a great addition to the furniture from this collection. Curved armrests of the chair provide comfort.

Sidney sofa is an example of elegant classical design and of high functionality. It will be suitable to the modern interior as well. Reliable design and seat depth dimension of the sofa will allow its owners to use it daily. Low legs of the sofa are practical decision because it will be easy to clean under it.

The elegant sofa from the Sydney collection is full-fledged place for sleeping. The head of the sofa and armrests are decorated with decorative nails around the perimeter which favourably set off its elegance and give the interior of the room delicacy.
descriptionCarousel.part2: The sofa is completed with orthopedic floating lamellas on silicone holders that bring additional comfort and increase the benefit of anatomic mattress. There are two scatter cushions as a unit coloured like the sofa (45*45 cm).

descriptionCarousel.part1: A romantic bed for the girl’s bedroom with curved bedposts, covered with fabric and small nails. The bed has an exquisite headboard, decorated with finishing nails and a capitonnage on the perimeter.
descriptionCarousel.part2: The bed is equipped with orthopedic floating slats with a silicone holder and two orthopedic pillows measuring 45x45 cm.

descriptionCarousel.part1: The pompous Lilibet bed of the classic shape will decorate the princess's room.
descriptionCarousel.part2: The curved back is decorated with voluminous capitonnage and finishing nails. The top of the headboard is decorated with a wooden crown. The bed can be decorated with Swarovski (on the crown, along the perimeter instead of nails and buttons).
descriptionCarousel.part3: The bed is equipped with orthopedic floating slats on silicone holders, which gives additional comfort and increases the benefit of the anatomical mattress. Two decorative pillows measuring 45x45 cm in the color of bed are included.

descriptionCarousel.part1: A modern bed of the Fouette collection has a light airy shape and elegant metal "heels" accompanied with a glamorous high headboard that overflows into thin elegant sides, will become the standard of style for its owner. The frame is made of natural wood materials. The bed is equipped with orthopedic floating slats on silicone holders, which gives additional comfort and increases the benefit of the anatomical mattress. Two decorative pillows measuring 45x45 cm in the color of bed are included.

Refinement, lightness and elegance are those three words which perfectly describe the modern sofa from Fouetté collection. The elegant metal “heels” which are characteristic of the whole of collection indicate individuality of style and design. The sofa is completed with orthopedic floating lamellas on silicone holders which provide additional comfort and increase benefit of anatomic mattress. There are two cushions as a unit 45x45 cm in size coloured like the sofa.

A classic-shaped bed with a round headboard of the Savoya collection has a special charm and style. The outer side and the headboard are decorated with handmade stitching. And the inner edging of the bed is decorated with a chenille cord. Bed post and frame are made of natural wooden materials.
descriptionCarousel.part2: This bed is suitable for embroidering the initials of its owner at the headboard of the bed (optional). The bed is equipped with orthopedic floating slats on silicone holders, which gives additional comfort and increases the benefit of the anatomical mattress. Two decorative pillows measuring 45x45 cm in the color of bed are included.

descriptionCarousel.part1: A luxurious classic-style bed of the Savoya collection with soft and rounded headboard will fit in to your interior perfectly. The headboard is decorated with a “marshmallow” capitonnage.
descriptionCarousel.part2: The bed is equipped with orthopedic floating slats on silicone holders, which gives additional comfort and increases the benefit of the anatomical mattress. Two decorative pillows measuring 45x45 cm in the color of bed are included.

descriptionCarousel.part1: The modern bed of the Elephant collection with movable sides is made of natural wooden materials and high-quality soft upholstery. The bed is equipped with orthopedic floating slats on silicone holders, which gives additional comfort and increases the benefit of the anatomical mattress. Two decorative pillows measuring 45x45 cm in the color of bed are included.

Laconic and modern dresser. The facade and 3D panel are made of Egger higher density fibre board. The frame is made of Egger laminate (environmental friendliness E0), equipped with Blum high-tech accessories (Austria), which allows to silently open and close three drawers. The dresser is painted with Austrian Adler matt water-based environmental friendly color. It has metal legs.

Modern dresser Komod Steps with 3D facade is made of Egger higher density fibre board. The frame is made of Egger laminate (environmental friendliness E0), equipped with Blum high-tech accessories (Austria), which allows to silently open and close three drawers. The dresser is painted with Austrian Adler matt water-based environmental friendly color. It has metal legs.
descriptionCarousel.part2: The innovative technology of 3D facades brings an unprecedented novelty to the interior and makes your furniture exclusive.

descriptionCarousel.part1: A dresser Komod Cruls with a 3D facade is made of Egger higher density fibre board. The frame is made of Egger laminate (environmental friendliness E0), equipped with Blum high-tech accessories (Austria), which allows to silently open and close three drawers. The dresser is painted with Austrian Adler matt water-based environmental friendly color. It has metal legs.

descriptionCarousel.part1: Smart block is an example of modern design. The facade is made of Egger higher density fibre board. The dresser is painted with Austrian Adler matt water-based environmental friendly color. It is stylish and practical at the same time.

A little table for the children's room is made of Egger higher density fibre board. It will become an indispensable tool for your child. There are two drawers and a mirror built into the top panel of the table. It allows combining a workplace and a makeup zone, which is necessary for every girl. As for ЗD panel, it will make the interior exclusive. The table has metal legs. It is equipped with Blum high-tech accessories (Austria).

descriptionCarousel.part1: Deep bed sheet will become a good supplement to a classical interior. It has deep pleats arranged in chessboard order. Top can be made of velour, straw cloth or silk. Back side is made of 100% Italian Camillatex cotton. Filler is a fine hypoallergenic polyester batting.
descriptionCarousel.part2: Sizes:

descriptionCarousel.part1: Diamond bed sheet is sewed across in diamond patterns (20*20 cm). It will be a good supplement to classical interior. Top can be made of velour, straw cloth or silk. Back side is made of 100% Italian Camillatex cotton. Filler is a fine hypoallergenic polyester batting.
descriptionCarousel.part2: Sizes:

descriptionCarousel.part1: Linen bedding made of 100% Italian Camillatex linen fabric creates an atmosphere of cosiness disposing to the recreation and relaxing environment.

The top can be made of velour, straw cloth or silk. Back side is made 100% Italian Camillatex cotton fabric. Filler is fine hypoallergenic polyester batting.

Back side is made of 100% Italian Camillatex cotton fabric. Filler is fine hypoallergenic polyester batting.

Back side is made of 100% Italian Camillatex cotton. Filler is a fine hypoallergenic polyester batting. The sheet will bring cosiness and warmth to your children’s room.

The bed will be suitable for both girls and boys. It is completed with orthopedic floating lamellas on silicone holders which provide additional comfort and increase benefit of anatomic mattress.
